content: Ah, hold up, we have to tidy up the Camp first. <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> sent me here to handle the transportation part of your daily needs.
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A想象中}I heard some planets are full of swirling sand, some have drifting snow, some have gigantic plants, and some even have colorful rivers!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: I'll show you what real dang—no, no, I mean, we'll go on a Starsea Voyage... once we tidy everything up... yeah, after that!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: I heard Mobai asked you to help unpack those boxes? Nice, I was curious about this on the way over. {A疑惑}They are sooo big!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Once we get this place all cleaned up, I'll transport in more great stuff. Now~, check out my ULTIMATE TORNADO SWEEP—
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Esassani, are you in charge of transportation?
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Don't you want to open them yourself?
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A疑惑}Who? Me? Chauffeur? That's—{短暂停}of course, that's right! I'll make sure you get a thrilling ride to see all sorts of—
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Come on, open 'em up! The ones right in front of the camp—<style=SizeSmall>Who knows what exciting surprises might pop out?!</style>
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Ahh, I just can't stop thinking about it... but for now, we gotta finish tidying up the Camp. One day! I'll definitely go check 'em out, swoosh~!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Once everything here's sorted and we've got a bit of normality, whether it's delivering goods or picking up your friends to come over for a visit, you can always count on me!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: If you don't know what to do, just talk to Mobai. If you're looking to buy or sell goods, go see Glenn. {A得意}And if you're bored, just come see me!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Once you get your own car, I'll show you how to drive! We'll go on trips to even moooore exciting places~!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: Me? I won't be doing the unboxing. Everyone's got their role, after all. Today, equipped with this broom, I'm the sweeping master! And one day, with a steering wheel, I'll be Sani the racer!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本

content: On the way to our <style=Highlight>Protoplanet</style>, the view was just incredible~! Every place has its own unique... vibe!
info: 整理营地-莎莎闲聊-废弃_主流程文本

content: Tee-hee, did I accidentally go a little too fast again? {A得意}I'll make light work of setting up the campsite and cleaning the tables and chairs! That sorta thing's right up my alley!
